sentences.english: During Xia, Shang and Zhou dynasties, Central Plains lay the core of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 夏商周三代文明，中原獨領風騷，居於全國中樞地位。

sentences.english: Luxury brands do well in the performance and design categories.
sentences.chinese: 豪華車在性能和設計領域獨領風騷。

sentences.english: The days of three-button dominance are over.
sentences.chinese: 現在，“三扣“獨領風騷的時代已經一去不復返了。
